tosdr.tldr:
You can only use Turnitin if you're:
- a school admin and only for your registered classes
- an instructor and only for registered classes that you currently teach
- a student and only for a registered class in which you are enrolled in
tosdr.case: Other applicable rules, terms, conditions or guidelines

title: Other applicable rules, terms, conditions or guidelines
quoteText: In the case of originality checking Services, You agree to use the Site and Services only as follows: (i) if You are a School Administrator, only in connection with registered classes offered through Your Customer, (ii) if You are an Instructor, only in connection with registered classes You are currently teaching, or (iii) if You are a student, only in connection with a registered class in which You are enrolled.
